text: He manusa! Ekati upama deya hacche, manoyogera sathe ta sona: Tomara allahâ€Œra paribarte yaderake daka tara to kakhano ekati machi'o srsti karate parabe na, e uddesye tara saba'i ekatra hale'o [1] ebam machi yadi kichu chiniye niye yaya tadera kacha theke, eta'o tara tara kacha theke ud'dhara karate parabe na. Anbesanakari o anbesanakrta kata'i na durbala
